name: Dr. George W. Davis Senior Center
description: The George W. Davis Senior Center serves as a hub of community services for our seniors and persons with disabilities. In addition to the services and structured programs, the Dr. George W. Davis Senior Center also serves as central meeting place. The Center retains the values of a community village that elders from historical Southern Black communities have brought to the Bayview, creating their own small town with people who have known each other for decades.
